name: In My Next Life...
description:
Made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2023.1

Made by  iArctic and Lew.

In " In my Next Life" you are an old man at the end . He has led a long fulfilling life full of faith and hope and now its time to move on to his next one. Play through different lives as different creatures seeing how long you can survive.

The Chicken

Play a life as a chicken running on a busy main road use your jump and double jump to avoid cars and road signs and try survive as long as you can as u speed up.

Chicken Controls

INPUTControlSpace or Left ClickJumpDouble Space or Double Left clickDouble JumpPPause

The Bird

Is it a bird? Is it a plane? Well its both as a bird you will have to fly through the skies avoiding planes and other birds. Also make sure you don't fly to high or hit the ground.

Bird Controls

INPUT Control Space or Left Click Fly PPause

Good luck in your new lives we would love to see how long you can survive post your times in the comments below.

Thanks for playing
